item.title: How does one properly format italics/bold text in title entries in Menus by Emily Short?
item.description:
I'm noticing some odd behavior when italicizing and bolding text in the title entries of a menu created by the Menus extension in Glulx. Consider this code:

Include Menus by Emily Short.

Blank is a room.

When play begins:
    now the current menu is the Table of Issue;
    carry out the displaying activity;
    clear the screen.

Table of Issue
title   subtable    description toggle
"Foo"   --  ""  --
"[italic type]Bar[roman type]"  --  ""  --
"Baz"   --  ""  --
"Qux"   --  ""  --

In the game proper, the menu titles after the italicized one have a different style and aren't indented properly. This also happens for bold text.

Is there are a way to use italics or bold text in titles while having the formatting remain consistent?

item.title: How do I use code formatting in posts on IF Answers?
item.description:
I have had not entirely an easy time figuring out how to format code properly in IFAnswers. I copied some code from the intfiction forum and it was automatically formatted as code, which was great, but then I couldn't figure out how to type anything that wasn't code after that and not have it formatted as code.

Eventually I typed some paragraph breaks in my non-code-formatted stuff and copy-pasted that whenever I needed to start a new paragraph that wasn't formatted as code, but that was less than ideal. Is there a simple HTMLish tag I can use for code formatting when typing a question/answer?
